column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I love this place! Bosscat is one of the restaurant options that's walking distance from our apartment. I would have moved in just for this place alone! The food and drinks here are AMAZING
column2: they never disappoint. I've been for dinner
column3: brunch and just drinks. Ambiance is always upbeat and it's a great place for people-watching. We went for brunch for the first time recently and we wanted something from their regular menu but didn't think it would be possible. We asked and Terry
column5: went above and beyond to accommodate us. I'll be personally requesting him in the future
column6: I hope he doesn't mind. I just LOVE great service when paired with good food too . I definitely recommend this place for lunch
